title: BOE nearly dropped from iPhone OLED panels supply chain due to design changes
content:
BOE is one of the manufacturers responsible for supplying OLED panels for the 6.1-inch model of the iPhone 13. But ever since February, the company hasn’t made iPhone OLED panels for Apple. Here’s why.

more…

The post BOE nearly dropped from iPhone OLED panels supply chain due to design changes appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: BOE is responsible for supplying OLED panels for the 6.1-inch Phone 13. But since February, it hasn't made iPhone OLED panels for Apple.
